name: Entropy
description:
Created and Minted by Andrew E. Brereton, aka aebrer, @aebrer on Twitter, on 2021-11-10. Find all my projects at aebrer.xyz .
Coded and recorded as a gif on the TIC-80, upscaled 3x, 12 seconds duration.
It was a Wednesday and I was in a good mood. It had been a very busy day, but everything went well.
This gif is minted to replace a non-looping gif from the "aebrer_entropy" series.
